arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}{Combat Effect Chance}%{/c}
{/if}{c_label}Passive:{/c} Gain {c_number}{SF_14}{/c} {c_important}{u}Resolve{/u}{/c} every {c_number}[{SF_15}|1|]{/c} seconds.

{c_label}Active:{/c} Encase yourself, becoming {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} and gaining {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%+|]{/c} Block Chance for {c_number}{buffduration:MAIN_ARMOR}{/c} seconds.
Activating {c_important}Armored Hide{/c} grants you Maximum {c_important}{u}Resolve{/u}{/c} and increases your Thorns by {c_number}[{SF_18}]{/c} for the duration.

When you Evade through enemies with {c_important}Armored Hide{/c} active, you deal {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} of your Thorns to them and Heal for {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_9})]){/c} per hit.
While active, {c_important}Armored Hide{/c} increases your Blocked Damage Reduction by {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c} for every Nearby enemy, up to {c_number}[{SF_10}*{SF_7}*100|%+|]{/c}.
